text: was a Japanese architect. In 1993, he won the Pritzker Architecture Prize.Pritzker Architecture Prize, "Fumihiko Maki, 1993 Laureate"; retrieved 2013-3-27. Maki died on 6 June 2024 at the age of 95.建築家の槙文彦さん死去 幕張メッセ、4ワールドトレードセンター設計 ==References== ==More reading== * Maki, Fumihiko, "Investigations in Collective Form" , A Special Publication Number 2, The School of Architecture, Washington University : St. Louis : June 1964 ==Other websites== * Maki and Associates website Category:1928 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Japanese architects Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Pritzker Architecture Prize winners Category:Artists from Tokyo Category:Harvard University faculty Category:University of Tokyo alumni Category:University of Tokyo faculty
title: Fumihiko Maki
